full_threads.body:
Hi Alison, 

Sorry about that. I've corrected the spelling. 

Here is the link:
https://murrayzircon.com.au/speak-up/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Thanks Rica!

One last thing, can you please correct the spelling of 'download' circled below? 😊



Then we're ready to go live!

Kind Regards,

Ms Alison Paley (she/her)
Murray Zircon Pty Ltd.
Executive Assistant
M 0423 880 870E apaley@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/



We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region.

time: 20mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath! Looks great! Are you able to make the following changes
  • Can you please make the 'Speak Up' title the larger size font at the top of the screen? At the moment the 'keep us in the loop' is bigger… (happy to send a screenshot if you don't know what I mean here)
  • Can we please replace the 'keep us in the loop' wording and replace with the following: "At Murray Zircon, we are committed to the highest levels of ethics and integrity in the way we do business. We understand this is crucial to our continued success and reputation. Our shared Values and Code of Conduct, and policies guide our everyday conduct. We have a responsibility to speak up and report unethical behaviour.
  • Next to the Whistleblower form (in between the 'Whistle blower submission' title and the 'please submit our confidential…', can you please include the following text: "Murray Zircon's Whistleblower Policy is an important tool in detecting corrupt, illegal or other undesirable conduct. Murray Zircon strongly encourages you to speak up if you suspect or witness any matters of concern. Murray Zircon will take all reports made under this Policy seriously."
  • In the form itself, we also need a contact method for the person reporting, name, phone and email, but these are not 'Required' fields.
  • On the form itself, in the title for the fourth field, where it says 'What are the names of the person(s) involved', can you please remove the brackets so its just 'persons'
  • Please also include the 'Speak Up' title in the footer of the page (that will show up then on each different page, not just the home screen right?)
Thanks so much! 😊 Kind Regards, Ms Alison Paley (she/her) Murray Zircon Pty Ltd. Executive Assistant M 0423 880 870E apaley@murrayzircon.com.au W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/ We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate. We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region. Please let me know if you would like any changes? The second form can go below this one once it's ready. Also, let me know if you would like a link to this from the footer of the website?

From: Alison Paley
Sent: Tuesday, 31 May 2022 2:55 PM
To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: New Page for Murray Zircon: Speak Up


Hi Health!


Hope you're well!

Its time for us to add another page to our website! This one will be called 'Speak Up' and we wish this to have access to two forms, one for a 'Whistleblower' and one for 'Modern Slavery'… But as of right now, we're only ready to have the 'whistleblower' form go live (I'm just trying to keep you in the loop about the modern slavery one!)


For the Whistleblower section, we'll need you to include a link to our PDF whistleblower policy (I'm just waiting for that to be signed and will send through next couple of days)


The questions we need in the Whistleblower form are:

· Date, time and location

· Names of person(s) involved, roles and their department or business

· Your relationship with the person(s) involved

· The general nature of your concern

· How you became aware of the issue

· Possible witnesses; and

· Other information that you have to support your report.


Is this something that you're able to assist with please?


Any issues or queries, please let me know! 😊


Kind Regards,

Ms Alison Paley (she/her)
Murray Zircon Pty Ltd.
Executive Assistant

M 0423 880 870
E apaley@murrayzircon.com.au
W www.murrayzircon.com.au

We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region.
